2. '''All In One Router''' (Using Ubuntu Jaunty in DEC Dectop)<<BR>>
Features: VPN Server, DHCP Server, DMZ support, Port Forward, DNS Configurations, Dynamic DNS Support, Firewall, Packet Filtering Firewall Support, VLAN, Internet Gateway, Parental Control (Website Blocks), NTP Time Server, Samba, Mini HTTP Web Server(Nginx)<<BR>><<BR>>
3. '''Writting "My First Step Into Ubuntu"''' :<<BR>> An e-book on the steps I take to start to fully use Ubuntu and ditched Windows from my PC & Laptop. It will also be a guide to teach those who already too get used to Windows to start adopt Ubuntu into their life without facing too much problems due to unfamiliar to a new desktop environment and platform.<<BR>><<BR>>
4. '''Lightweight Portable Ubuntu Web Server LiveCD''' :<<BR>> Compile a LiveCD based on Lucid Lynx Server Edition with minimal installation. <<BR>>
Installed apps: Lighttpd, MySQL5, proftpd, PHP5, Bind9, Webmin, Dropbear etc.<<BR>>
RAM Requirement: 256MB<<BR>>
Default config:<<BR>>
IP=192.168.1.245 | Netmask=255.255.255.0 | Default Gateway IP=192.168.1.1 | Default DNS: 8.8.8.8,8.8.4.4
